description: STEP 2 DETECT tool. Extracts sparse related papers within gap domains identified at relevance 0.05–0.25 by ti-survey. The agent analyzes contact concepts from these results and computes the Innovation Vacuum Index. Requires both query and gap_domain parameters.

configuration.query: FROM ti-papers METADATA _score | WHERE MATCH(content, ?query) AND domain == ?gap_domain | SORT _score DESC | LIMIT 10 | KEEP arxiv_id, title, abstract, primary_category, categories, _score, published

query.description: Research topic query used in STEP 1

gap_domain.description: Domain name identified as a gap. Use the domain value from ti-survey results in the avg_score 0.05–0.25 range
